posts.post_content:
$9 each paypal owed or check...These are really rough front and back, but mostly in one piece. Will be this evening before i can answer emails...emails take priority. Postage $2 per order.

[url]todd@accessthewebsite.com[/url]

[IMG]http://i235.photobucket.com/albums/ee291/bbcard1/2061.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i235.photobucket.com/albums/ee291/bbcard1/t2063.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i235.photobucket.com/albums/ee291/bbcard1/t2062.jpg[/IMG]
Do the cards come with those neat looking card holder inserts?  Where did you get those inserts?  They look really nice and it's a nice way to keep the cards from moving around in the holder.

Yes they do. if you or anyone else who is interested will email me your address, I will send you a sample and a sell sheet.  I just got the die perfected last week.  I plan to have a website live and a few other designs by the summer. I like that you can store a lot of low grade t cards in a smallish space...I have my whole set in two small photo boxes.
